tweet_text: It turns out the answer is highly dependent on the protein. Disulfides and flexibility can play a big role, such that most any glycan can fit (flexible protein), or most any glycan can break it (disulfide-rich protein). But for an antibody, Rosetta calcs give decent predictions.
